name: Template.Infix
comment:
Infix operators for more concise template construction

@docs (<%), (%>)

values.comment:
Operator alias for andString

    template "my string " <% .hello %> " another string"

Operator alias for andValue

    template "my string " <% .hello

name: Template

aliases.name: Template
aliases.comment: A list of the components of a template

values.name: render
values.comment:
Walks through a template's components and renders them to a single string

    render
      (template "my string " `andValue` .hello)
      ({ hello = "world" })

values.name: template
values.comment:
Create an initial template starting with the given string

    template "my string "

values.name: withString
values.comment:
Attach a string to a template

    template "my string "
        |> withValue .hello
        |> withString " another string"

values.name: withValue
values.comment:
Attach a record accessor to a template

    template "my string "
        |> withValue .hello
